Desc.entry: Martial arts tuition in jeet kune do, Brazilian jui jitsu, kali, Russian kettlebell and Lil' Kickers. Open to all ages an abilities, male and female.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 5.30-6.15pm (kids), 7-8pm (phase 1), 8-9pm (Brazilian jui jitsu), 9.-10pm (kali), Wed 6-7pm (kettlebell), 7-8pm (jeet kune do), 8-9pm (Brazilian jui jitsu), 9-10pm (kali), Thurs 7-8pm (phase 2), 8-9pm (Brazilian jiu jitsu)

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - COMBINATION, KICK BOXING AND THAI BOXING
